content.headingSubtitle: Security-first consulting and delivery support — from secure development to governance, analysis, and execution.

list.title: Service Areas
list.subtitle: Select a service to view details.

services.title: Secure Software Development Lifecycle (SSDLC)
services.body: We help organizations integrate security into every stage of software development. Our services include secure coding practices, threat modeling, code reviews, DevSecOps integration, secure architecture guidance, and full SSDLC program setup.
services.outcome: Stronger applications built with security at their core.

services.title: Cybersecurity Services
services.body: We support organizations in strengthening their cybersecurity posture through risk and vulnerability assessments, security policy development, cloud and infrastructure security review, governance and compliance support, incident readiness planning, and security awareness training.
services.outcome: Reduced risk, improved resilience, and better security governance.

services.title: Business Analysis
services.body: We translate business needs into clear requirements that drive successful projects. Services include requirements gathering, process and workflow analysis, gap assessments, process improvement, documentation (BRDs, FRDs, use cases, user stories), and stakeholder management.
services.outcome: Greater clarity, reduced rework, and smoother execution.

services.title: Project Management
services.body: Our project managers help organizations deliver initiatives with structure and discipline. Services include full lifecycle management, PMO setup, Agile/Waterfall/Hybrid delivery, scheduling, resource planning, risk/issue management, vendor coordination, and project recovery.
services.outcome: Projects delivered on time, within budget, and aligned to goals.

services.title: Business & Strategy Consulting
services.body: We help organizations strengthen operations and prepare for growth. Services include strategic planning, operational improvement, digital transformation guidance, change management, business continuity planning, and performance measurement frameworks.
services.outcome: Better decisions, stronger operations, and sustainable performance.

cta.title: Not sure which service fits?
cta.subtitle: Describe your situation and we’ll suggest the best starting point.
